definition: fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: Expression product of overal S genome fragment reacted to monoclonal antibody Lane 3.
sentences.chinese: 基因全长片段表达产物与单克隆抗体反应3。

sentences.english: The owners of these experiences recognize them as fragmentary semimemories.
sentences.chinese: 这些过往经历的主人把它们当作是零碎的半记忆片段。

sentences.english: The message set is then reordered into the combined fragment.
sentences.chinese: 消息集合也会重新排序到合并的片段中。

sentences.english: Judges 5 is also another ancient song fragment in verses four to five.
sentences.chinese: 士师记》5中也有古老歌谣的片段，诗4和。

sentences.english: The SQL fragment can be as complex as you want avec even include subselects.
sentences.chinese: SQL片段可以是任意复杂的，甚至可包含子查询。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical curative effect of segmental arch technique in incisor luxation.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价片段弓矫治技术治疗前牙外伤的效果。

sentences.english: So, we introduce fragment identifiers for the speakers as well.
sentences.chinese: 所以，对于演讲者，我们仍旧使用片段标识。

sentences.english: This part of the story is a wonderful illustration of God's goodness to a sinner.
sentences.chinese: 故事的这个片段，正好勾划了神如何恩待罪人。

sentences.english: That content comes in the form of snippets.
sentences.chinese: 采用片段的形式提供内容。

sentences.english: It then melded these clips together to produce an estimate of what the real clip looked like.
sentences.chinese: 然后把这些片段结合起来产生一个对真实片段的估计。

sentences.english: It then melded these clips together to produce an estimate of what the real clip looked like.
sentences.chinese: 然后把这些片段结合起来产生一个对真实片段的估计。

sentences.english: These are structured pieces of information that specifically define data.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是明确定义数据的结构化信息片段。

sentences.english: Passive power conditioning provides reliability for single-segment needs. The power supply supports high-power trunk protection for hazardous locations.
sentences.chinese: 功率调解装置为单一片段的需要提供可靠的电力供应。

sentences.english: Snippets are like method calls, in which you are passing in parameters.
sentences.chinese: 代码片段类似于可在其中传递参数的方法调用。

sentences.english: These fragments I have shored against my ruins.
sentences.chinese: 这些片段我用来支撑我的断垣残壁。

sentences.english: When man fuses with his Father Fragment, he is then Eternal.
sentences.chinese: 当一个人与父之片段相融合，他就是永恒的。

definition: opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to cut off a section of sth
end credits (of a movie etc)/ending (of a movie etc)
